entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
